name: Rocket Arena (skipyC)
description:
Rocket Arena. Vehicular combat. Game made for UE4JAM in 3 days.

Controls:

  • WASD: move
  • (While in air) A/D/L_Shift/L_Ctrl: Roll (Left/Right/Up/Down)
  • Space: Handbrake
  • Mouse Left: Shoot minigun
  • Mouse Right: Shoot rockets
  • Tab: Change camera (Recommended to change at the beginning)
  • R: Restart vehicle
  • I: Restart map (...If an enemy goes missing
